ygData.subject: Re: mutitaskin madness-reply
ygData.msgSnippet: Im looking for a solution to that too. Would be nice to be able to switch between game and desktop for ICQing, Mail or even checking of maps of places in EQ.
ygData.messageBody:
Im looking for a solution to that too. Would be nice to be able to switch
between game and desktop for ICQing, Mail or even checking of maps of places
in EQ. Looks llike EQ takes over 100% of the PC resouces. Any one able to
overcome this inconvenience. pls share.

Yiyang

From: hans ng <nahemah@...>

Subject: [sg-everquest] mutitaskin madness
